text: Bogusław Kaczyński (May 2, 1942 - January 21, 2016) was a Polish classical music journalist. He was born in Biała Podlaska, Poland. ==Career== He was the author of a classical recording series called The Golden Collection. He also hosted musical competitions, including the Frederic Chopin Piano Competition, the Henryk Wieniawski Violin Competition, and the New Year's Concerts in Vienna. He has been ranked among the top 10 Polish television personalities by the Polityka magazine. ==Death== Kaczyński died in Warsaw, Poland of a stroke on January 21, 2016, aged 73. == References == ==Other websites== * Bogusław Kaczyński – Homepage * Warszawa.
